Abzan Beastmaster.name: Abzan Beastmaster
Abzan Beastmaster.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

printings.flavor: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.

Accumulated Knowledge.name: Accumulated Knowledge
Accumulated Knowledge.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

printings.flavor:
"I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
—Takara, to Eladamri

Acidic Slime.name: Acidic Slime
Acidic Slime.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

Albino Troll.name: Albino Troll
Albino Troll.text:
Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

Anathemancer.name: Anathemancer
Anathemancer.text:
When Anathemancer enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
Unearth {5}{B}{R} ({5}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

Ancient Grudge.name: Ancient Grudge
Ancient Grudge.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

printings.flavor: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

Ancient Ziggurat.name: Ancient Ziggurat
Ancient Ziggurat.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

printings.flavor: Leylines branch out from its foundation like roots from a tree. These draw mana from every region and welcome all living things into its verdant chambers.

Armadillo Cloak.name: Armadillo Cloak
Armadillo Cloak.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

printings.flavor:
"Don't laugh. It works."
—Yavimaya ranger

Arrogant Wurm.name: Arrogant Wurm
Arrogant Wurm.text:
Trample
Madness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

printings.flavor: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite size.

Artisan of Kozilek.name: Artisan of Kozilek
Artisan of Kozilek.text:
When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

Astral Slide.name: Astral Slide
Astral Slide.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

printings.flavor:
"The hum of the universe is never off-key."
—Mystic elder

Aura of Silence.name: Aura of Silence
Aura of Silence.text:
Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

printings.flavor: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

Avalanche Riders.name: Avalanche Riders
Avalanche Riders.text:
Haste
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

Banisher Priest.name: Banisher Priest
Banisher Priest.text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

printings.flavor: "Oathbreaker, I cast you out!"

Banishing Light.name: Banishing Light
Banishing Light.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

Basking Rootwalla.name: Basking Rootwalla
Basking Rootwalla.text:
{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

Bile Blight.name: Bile Blight
Bile Blight.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.

printings.flavor: Not an arrow loosed, javelin thrown, nor sword raised. None were needed.

Black Knight.name: Black Knight
Black Knight.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

printings.flavor:
"The chill, to him who breathed it, drew / Down with his blood, till all his heart was cold."
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, Idyls of the King

Blastoderm.name: Blastoderm
Blastoderm.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Bloodbraid Elf.name: Bloodbraid Elf
Bloodbraid Elf.text:
Haste
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

Bottle Gnomes.name: Bottle Gnomes
Bottle Gnomes.text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

printings.flavor:
"I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."
—Karn, silver golem

Brain Maggot.name: Brain Maggot
Brain Maggot.text: When Brain Maggot enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Brain Maggot leaves the battlefield.

Brainstorm.name: Brainstorm
Brainstorm.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

printings.flavor:
"I see more than other because I know where to look"
—Saprazzan vizier

Browbeat.name: Browbeat
Browbeat.text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

printings.flavor:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

Cabal Coffers.name: Cabal Coffers
Cabal Coffers.text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.

printings.flavor: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun-and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

Cabal Therapy.name: Cabal Therapy
Cabal Therapy.text:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Call of the Conclave.name: Call of the Conclave
Call of the Conclave.text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.

printings.flavor: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

Capsize.name: Capsize
Capsize.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

Carnophage.name: Carnophage
Carnophage.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.

printings.flavor:
"And in their blind and unattaining state their miserable lives have sunk so low that they must envy every other fate."
—Dante, Inferno, trans. Ciardi

Carrion Feeder.name: Carrion Feeder
Carrion Feeder.text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

printings.flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

Chainer's Edict.name: Chainer's Edict
Chainer's Edict.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

printings.flavor: The pits have their own form of mercy.

Circle of Protection: Red.name: Circle of Protection: Red
Circle of Protection: Red.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

Circular Logic.name: Circular Logic
Circular Logic.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

Cloudpost.name: Cloudpost
Cloudpost.text:
Cloudpost enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool for each Locus on the battlefield.

printings.flavor: "He watches from above. He watches from below. He watches from within." -Inscription on Tel-Jilad, the Tree of Tales

Contagion Clasp.name: Contagion Clasp
Contagion Clasp.text:
When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

printings.flavor:
"It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."
—Ertai, wizard adept

Crystalline Sliver.name: Crystalline Sliver
Crystalline Sliver.text: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

printings.flavor: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly-they know they cannot be caught.

Cultivate.name: Cultivate
Cultivate.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

printings.flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

Death.name: Death
Death.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

printings.artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters

Deep Analysis.name: Deep Analysis
Deep Analysis.text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

printings.flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

Desert.name: Desert
Desert.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

Despise.name: Despise
Despise.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.

printings.flavor:
"Truth is always a weapon in your enemies' hands."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

Dimir Charm.name: Dimir Charm
Dimir Charm.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
• Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

printings.flavor:
"Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to."
—Lazav

Disdainful Stroke.name: Disdainful Stroke
Disdainful Stroke.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

printings.flavor: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

Dismember.name: Dismember
Dismember.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

printings.flavor:
"You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."
—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

Dissipate.name: Dissipate
Dissipate.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

Dissolve.name: Dissolve
Dissolve.text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

printings.flavor: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

Duress.name: Duress
Duress.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

printings.flavor:
"We decide who is worthy of our works."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

Elves of Deep Shadow.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
Elves of Deep Shadow.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

printings.flavor:
"They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out."
—Ailheen, Speaker of the Council

"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane

Elvish Visionary.name: Elvish Visionary
Elvish Visionary.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

printings.flavor: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

Encroaching Wastes.name: Encroaching Wastes
Encroaching Wastes.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.

printings.flavor: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.

Engineered Plague.name: Engineered Plague
Engineered Plague.text:
As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.

printings.flavor:
"The admixture of bitterwort in the viral brew has produced most favorable results."
—Phyrexian progress notes

Eternal Witness.name: Eternal Witness
Eternal Witness.text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

printings.flavor: Gaea needs no book to record every act.

Everflowing Chalice.name: Everflowing Chalice
Everflowing Chalice.text:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

Evolving Wilds.name: Evolving Wilds
Evolving Wilds.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

printings.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

Experiment One.name: Experiment One
Experiment One.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

Fact or Fiction.name: Fact or Fiction
Fact or Fiction.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Fanatic of Xenagos.name: Fanatic of Xenagos
Fanatic of Xenagos.text:
Trample
Tribute 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may place a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Fanatic of Xenagos enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

Farseek.name: Farseek
Farseek.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

printings.flavor: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

Fire.name: Fire
Fire.text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

Fireblast.name: Fireblast
Fireblast.text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

Firebolt.name: Firebolt
Firebolt.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

printings.flavor: Reach out and torch someone.

Fireslinger.name: Fireslinger
Fireslinger.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.

printings.flavor:
"One pain is lessened by another's anguish."
—William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

Flametongue Kavu.name: Flametongue Kavu
Flametongue Kavu.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

printings.flavor:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay

Forbid.name: Forbid
Forbid.text:
Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell.

Forbidden Alchemy.name: Forbidden Alchemy
Forbidden Alchemy.text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Force Spike.name: Force Spike
Force Spike.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

Frenzied Goblin.name: Frenzied Goblin
Frenzied Goblin.text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

printings.flavor: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

Gatekeeper of Malakir.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
Gatekeeper of Malakir.text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.

printings.flavor: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

Gerrard's Verdict.name: Gerrard's Verdict
Gerrard's Verdict.text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

printings.flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

Ghor-Clan Rampager.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
Ghor-Clan Rampager.text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

printings.flavor:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

Ghostly Prison.name: Ghostly Prison
Ghostly Prison.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.

printings.flavor:
"May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."
—Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

Giant Growth.name: Giant Growth
Giant Growth.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

Gitaxian Probe.name: Gitaxian Probe
Gitaxian Probe.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.

printings.flavor:
"My flesh holds no secrets, monster. The spirit of Mirrodin will fight on."
—Vy Covalt, Mirran resistance

Glistener Elf.name: Glistener Elf
Glistener Elf.text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

printings.flavor: "Beg me for life, and I will fill you with the glory of Phyrexian perfection."
Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

Goblin Bombardment.name: Goblin Bombardment
Goblin Bombardment.text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

Goblin Legionnaire.name: Goblin Legionnaire
Goblin Legionnaire.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

Goblin Ringleader.name: Goblin Ringleader
Goblin Ringleader.text:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Goblin Warchief.name: Goblin Warchief
Goblin Warchief.text:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.

printings.flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

Grisly Salvage.name: Grisly Salvage
Grisly Salvage.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

printings.flavor: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

Hordeling Outburst.name: Hordeling Outburst
Hordeling Outburst.text: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

printings.flavor: Kolaghan goblins rush into battle to satisfy their desire for violence as well as their desire not to be eaten.

Ice.name: Ice
Ice.text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

Icy Manipulator.name: Icy Manipulator
Icy Manipulator.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

printings.flavor: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

Impulse.name: Impulse
Impulse.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Isochron Scepter.name: Isochron Scepter
Isochron Scepter.text:
Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand.
{2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

Izzet Charm.name: Izzet Charm
Izzet Charm.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

printings.flavor: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

Jackal Pup.name: Jackal Pup
Jackal Pup.text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

printings.flavor:
"Cry havoc and let slip the dogs of war."
—William Shakespeare, Julius Caesar

Judge's Familiar.name: Judge's Familiar
Judge's Familiar.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

printings.flavor:
"It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor."
—Barvisa, courtroom scribe

Juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.text:
Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

printings.flavor: Built with neither a way to steer nor a way to stop, the juggernauts were simply aimed at an enemy's best defenses and told to charge.

Kird Ape.name: Kird Ape
Kird Ape.text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

printings.flavor: It puts the "fur" in "fury."

Kitchen Finks.name: Kitchen Finks
Kitchen Finks.text:
When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

Krosan Grip.name: Krosan Grip
Krosan Grip.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

printings.flavor:
"Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

Krosan Tusker.name: Krosan Tusker
Krosan Tusker.text:
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Krosan Warchief.name: Krosan Warchief
Krosan Warchief.text:
Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.

printings.flavor: It turns prey into predator.

Life.name: Life
Life.text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

printings.artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters

Lightning Greaves.name: Lightning Greaves
Lightning Greaves.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}

printings.flavor: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

Lightning Rift.name: Lightning Rift
Lightning Rift.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, Lightning Rift deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor: Options will cost you, but a lack of options will cost you even more.

Lingering Souls.name: Lingering Souls
Lingering Souls.text:
Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

printings.flavor: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

Lobotomy.name: Lobotomy
Lobotomy.text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

Longbow Archer.name: Longbow Archer
Longbow Archer.text: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

printings.flavor:
"If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu."
—Roya, Zhalfirin archer

Magma Jet.name: Magma Jet
Magma Jet.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Magma Spray.name: Magma Spray
Magma Spray.text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

printings.flavor: A stone hurled at an enemy is deadlier in liquid form.

Merrow Reejerey.name: Merrow Reejerey
Merrow Reejerey.text:
Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.

printings.flavor: Steady and silent as the deep current, the reejerey guides the course of the school.

Mind Warp.name: Mind Warp
Mind Warp.text: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.

printings.flavor: The hardest of wizards can have the softest of minds.

Mogg Fanatic.name: Mogg Fanatic
Mogg Fanatic.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor:
"As if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it."
—Herman Melville, Moby Dick

Mother of Runes.name: Mother of Runes
Mother of Runes.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

printings.flavor: "My family protects all families."

Mulldrifter.name: Mulldrifter
Mulldrifter.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

Murderous Redcap.name: Murderous Redcap
Murderous Redcap.text:
When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

printings.flavor: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

Myr Enforcer.name: Myr Enforcer
Myr Enforcer.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

printings.flavor: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

Oblivion Ring.name: Oblivion Ring
Oblivion Ring.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Ophidian.name: Ophidian
Ophidian.text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

printings.flavor:
"I will ... tell thee more than thou hast wit to ask."
—Christopher Marlowe, Doctor Faustus

Pendelhaven.name: Pendelhaven
Pendelhaven.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

printings.flavor: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

Pillar of Flame.name: Pillar of Flame
Pillar of Flame.text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

printings.flavor: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

Priest of Titania.name: Priest of Titania
Priest of Titania.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf on the battlefield.

printings.flavor: Titania rewards all who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

Prodigal Sorcerer.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
Prodigal Sorcerer.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

Qasali Pridemage.name: Qasali Pridemage
Qasali Pridemage.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

printings.flavor: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

Quirion Ranger.name: Quirion Ranger
Quirion Ranger.text: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

printings.flavor:
"I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately."
—Henry David Thoreau, Walden

Rakdos Cackler.name: Rakdos Cackler
Rakdos Cackler.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

printings.flavor: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

Rancor.name: Rancor
Rancor.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

printings.flavor: Hatred outlives the hateful.

Reanimate.name: Reanimate
Reanimate.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

printings.flavor:
"You will learn to earn death."
—Volrath

Reliquary Tower.name: Reliquary Tower
Reliquary Tower.text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

printings.flavor: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

Remand.name: Remand
Remand.text:
Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard.
Draw a card.

printings.flavor: Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive.

Resurrection.name: Resurrection
Resurrection.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

printings.flavor: "Think of this new life not as a gift from the angels but as a command to fight for their cause once more." —War blessing of Serra

Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

Rift Bolt.name: Rift Bolt
Rift Bolt.text:
Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

River Boa.name: River Boa
River Boa.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{G}: Regenerate River Boa.

printings.flavor:
"But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."
—Afari, Tales

Roar of the Wurm.name: Roar of the Wurm
Roar of the Wurm.text:
Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Sakura-Tribe Elder.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
Sakura-Tribe Elder.text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

printings.flavor: Slain orochi warriors were buried with a tree sapling so they would become part of the forest after death.

Savage Lands.name: Savage Lands
Savage Lands.text:
Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.

printings.flavor: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

Scragnoth.name: Scragnoth
Scragnoth.text:
Scragnoth can't be countered.
Protection from blue

printings.flavor: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

Seal of Cleansing.name: Seal of Cleansing
Seal of Cleansing.text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

printings.flavor:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

Searing Spear.name: Searing Spear
Searing Spear.text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

Serrated Arrows.name: Serrated Arrows
Serrated Arrows.text:
Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.
{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

Shock.name: Shock
Shock.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor: Lightning tethers souls to the world. —Kor saying

Shrapnel Blast.name: Shrapnel Blast
Shrapnel Blast.text:
As an additional cost to cast Shrapnel Blast, sacrifice an artifact.
Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor: To the Krark Clan, every artifact has a trigger and a barrel.
Otaria's last defense against the wave of chaos threatening to engulf it.

Sin Collector.name: Sin Collector
Sin Collector.text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

printings.flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

Slice and Dice.name: Slice and Dice
Slice and Dice.text:
Slice and Dice deals 4 damage to each creature.
Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Slice and Dice, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature.

Smother.name: Smother
Smother.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

printings.flavor:
"I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg."
—Phage the Untouchable

Soltari Priest.name: Soltari Priest
Soltari Priest.text:
Protection from red
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

printings.flavor: "Fire is the test of gold; adversity of strong men." - Seneca, "On Providence," trans. Basara

Sparksmith.name: Sparksmith
Sparksmith.text: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

printings.flavor: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

Spellstutter Sprite.text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

Spike Feeder.text:
Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

Squadron Hawk.text:
Flying

Staunch Defenders.name: Staunch Defenders
Staunch Defenders.text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

printings.flavor:
"Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

Stoke the Flames.name: Stoke the Flames
Stoke the Flames.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Stoke the Flames deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

Suspension Field.name: Suspension Field
Suspension Field.text: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

Swords to Plowshares.name: Swords to Plowshares
Swords to Plowshares.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

printings.flavor: "Peace hath her victories No less renownd than war." - John Milton, "To the Lord General Cromwell"

Tectonic Edge.name: Tectonic Edge
Tectonic Edge.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.

printings.flavor:
"We move because the earth does."
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

Teetering Peaks.name: Teetering Peaks
Teetering Peaks.text:
Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

Tendrils of Agony.name: Tendrils of Agony
Tendrils of Agony.text:
Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

Terminate.name: Terminate
Terminate.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

printings.flavor: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods."

Terror.name: Terror
Terror.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

Thirst for Knowledge.name: Thirst for Knowledge
Thirst for Knowledge.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

printings.flavor: Raissa transformed herself into a vessel for the Watchword Codex, allowing the arcane lore to flow through her body.

Tidehollow Sculler.name: Tidehollow Sculler
Tidehollow Sculler.text:
When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

Tormented Hero.name: Tormented Hero
Tormented Hero.text:
Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

Tormod's Crypt.name: Tormod's Crypt
Tormod's Crypt.text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

printings.flavor: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

Treetop Village.name: Treetop Village
Treetop Village.text:
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

Volcanic Geyser.name: Volcanic Geyser
Volcanic Geyser.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.

printings.flavor: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I? —Femeref riddle

Wall of Blossoms.name: Wall of Blossoms
Wall of Blossoms.text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

printings.flavor: "Everything in Nature contains all the powers of Nature." - Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Compensation"

Wall of Omens.text:
Defender
When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

printings.flavor:
"I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."
—Expedition journal entry

Wall of Roots.name: Wall of Roots
Wall of Roots.text:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.

printings.flavor: Root systems in Mwonvuli twist through currents of mana rather than soil.

Warleader's Helix.name: Warleader's Helix
Warleader's Helix.text: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

printings.flavor:
"There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them."
—Aurelia
Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

Whipcorder.name: Whipcorder
Whipcorder.text:
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

printings.flavor: His bolas whirl like galaxies, but it's his enemies who see stars.

White Knight.name: White Knight
White Knight.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

printings.flavor:
"When good men die their goodness does not perish, / But lives though they are gone."
—Euripides, Termenidae, trans. Morgan

Wild Mongrel.name: Wild Mongrel
Wild Mongrel.text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

printings.flavor: It teaches you to play dead.

Wild Nacatl.name: Wild Nacatl
Wild Nacatl.text:
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

printings.flavor: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

Willbender.name: Willbender
Willbender.text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

Wing Shards.name: Wing Shards
Wing Shards.text:
Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

Withered Wretch.name: Withered Wretch
Withered Wretch.text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.

printings.flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

Wonder.name: Wonder
Wonder.text:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

printings.flavor:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
—Scroll of Beginnings

Wren's Run Vanquisher.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
Wren's Run Vanquisher.text:
As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
